meanings.sent1: She is alkalinizing the soil to help her plants grow better.
meanings.sent2: Adding baking soda to the solution is alkalinizing it.
meanings.sent3: The lemon juice was so acidic that it needed alkalinizing to be drinkable.
meanings.sent4: His positive attitude seemed to alkalinize the whole room.
meanings.sent5: The scientist demonstrated how alkalinizing a liquid changes its properties.

meanings.definition: To make or become less acidic.
meanings.sent1: The medication is alkalinizing his stomach to reduce acidity.
meanings.sent2: By adding a base, you can alkalinize the solution.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally added too much vinegar, so he had to alkalinize the dish.
meanings.sent4: Her calming presence seemed to alkalinize the tense situation.
meanings.sent5: The process of alkalinizing the water made it safe to drink.
